job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.description: This Jobot Job is hosted by Kat Sarinas  Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button and sending us your resume.  Salary $110,000 - $180,000 per year We are a growing open-source platform for launching decentralized finance applications and enterprise blockchain deployments. We make it simple to launch finance applications using blockchain technology. This remote role offers the opportunity to build the internet of finance. We are a collaborative and supportive team who empower people to build an open, simple, and democratic system. Bachelorâ€™s degree in data science/analytics or related field  3+ years of data analytics experience  Basic knowledge on computer science principles and architecture  Experience in data mining, machine learning and with data visualization  Excellent organization, logic and experience with the experimental method  Experience reviewing and streamlining business processes, including gathering and documenting business requirements, developing and implementing new processes and procedures  Ability to accurately perform complex mathematical computations  Ability to manage multiple priorities, both large and complex  Be able to collaborate and innovate as a means to create exceptional value for our members, our company, and our community.  Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities  Ability to break down and understand complex business problems, define a solution and implement it using advanced quantitative methods Python  SQL and/or NoSQL databases  R  Strong communication skills with regard to analytical concepts and methods  A very high level of intellectual curiosity  AWS or Google Cloud  Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply" button.
